item.title: Test
item.description: This is a new post its really just a big test To add a cover photo, in frontmatter add: cover: image: img/img.jpg alt: 'alt' caption: 'caption' To add tags and categories, in frontmatter add: ``` tags: [“ona, dos, tre”] categories: [“one, to, tres”]
